contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary|ISP|isp}} '''ISP''' may refer to: In business: * [[ISP Sports]], a marketing company which operates several college sports radio broadcast networks * [[Institute of Sales Promotion]], a UK organisation * [[Integrated Service Provider]], a for-hire firm that performs a variety of logistics service activities * [[Internet Service Provider]], an organization that offers users access to the Internet and related services In computer science: * [[ISP Formal Verification Tool]], an "In-situ Partial Order" verification tool for MPI (Message Passing Interface) programs * Image Signal Processor, [[digital camera]] hardware * [[In-System Programming]], a way to configure programmable logic devices while they are installed in a larger system * [[Interface segregation principle]], a principle of Object Oriented Design * [[Internet service provider]], an organization that provides access to the Internet. In education: * [[Independent study]] project * [[Information Systems Professional]], an information technology title and post-nominal * [[Instituto Superior Politécnico]], a university in São Tomé and Príncipe * [[Integrated science program]], an honors program at Northwestern University * [[International School of Pakistan]], a private school in Kuwait * [[International School of Paris]], a private school in Paris, France * [[International School of Prague]], an English speaking international school, located in Prague, Czech Republic * [[Yale Information Society Project]] at Yale Law School * Institute for Social sciences of Politics, a research laboratory in political sociology and political science at [[Paris West University Nanterre La Défense]] and [[École Normale Supérieure de Cachan]], France. In law enforcement: * [[Idaho State Police]], law enforcement agency of Idaho * [[Illinois State Police]], law enforcement agencies across Illinois * [[Indiana State Police]], law enforcement agency of Indiana * [[Iowa State Police]], law enforcement agency of Iowa In organizations: * [[Independent Socialist Party (disambiguation)]], in several countries * [[Invisibl Skratch Piklz]], a group of turntable artists in the early 1990s In physics and engineering: * [[Invariant set postulate]], the only postulate joining fractal cosmology with quantum mechanics * [[Specific impulse]], represented by ''I<sub>sp</sub>'', a way to describe rocket and jet engine efficiency * Imperial smelting process, a [[Zinc_smelting#Blast_furnace_process_(Imperial_Smelting_Process)|method of zinc and lead production]] developed by the Imperial Smelting Corporation In transportation: * [[Islip railway station]], England, Network Rail station code ISP * [[Long Island MacArthur Airport]], Islip, New York, IATA Airport Code ISP In other uses: * Indigenous sugar cane, [[polysaccharide]]<!-- see http://books.google.com/books?id=Q7fAp-arpEEC&pg=PA322 --> {{Disambiguation}}
